parse.title: List of countries by pear production

text.*:
Countries by pear production in 2016

This is a list of countries by pear production in 2016, based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization Corporate Statistical Database.[1] The total world production for pears in 2016 was 41,709,029 metric tonnes.[n 1] China was by far the largest producer, accounting for 49.3% of world production.

Contents

  • 1 Production by country
    • 1.1 >100,000 tonnes
    • 1.2 10,000–100,000 tonnes
    • 1.3 <10,000 tonnes
  • 2 Notes
  • 3 References
